Czech[edit]

  • IPA(key): [ˈmɛksɪko]

    		(file)

Proper noun[edit]

Mexiko n

  1. Mexico

Related terms[edit]

  • mexický
  • Mexičan

German[edit]

 Mexiko on German Wikipedia

Alternative forms[edit]

  • Mexico (dated)
  • Mexicum (obsolete)

Etymology[edit]

From Spanish México, from Classical Nahuatl Mēxihco.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈmɛksiko/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Proper noun[edit]

Mexiko n (genitive Mexikos)

  1. Mexico

Derived terms[edit]

  • Golf von Mexiko
  • Mexikaner
  • mexikanisch
  • Neumexiko

Slovak[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Spanish México, from Nahuatl mexihco.

Proper noun[edit]

Mexiko n (genitive Mexika) declension pattern mesto

  1. Mexico
  2. Mexico City

Declension[edit]

Declension of Mexiko
singulare tantum
nominativeMexiko
genitiveMexika
dativeMexiku
accusativeMexiko
locativeMexiku
instrumentalMexikom

Derived terms[edit]

  • mexický, mexicky
  • Mexičan m
  • Mexičanka f

References[edit]

  • Mexiko in Slovak dictionaries at korpus.sk

Swedish[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Nahuatl

Proper noun[edit]

Mexiko n (genitive Mexikos)
